name: unabashed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without any worry about possible criticism or embarrassment: She is to this day unabashed in her patriotism. He is an unabashed capitalist. Compare
abashed

not worried about being criticized or embarrassed: an unabashed critic of Congress an unabashed supporter of the team
